description:
Tanuma Chisato is part of the Kendo Club and is an admirer of http://anidb.net/ch1201 [Hasekura Rei]. She went on a date with Rei in the first season after finding Rei`s card in the treasure hunt on Valentine`s Day. In the fourth season she is the finder of http://anidb.net/ch1200 [Yoshino]`s card.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Tanuma Chisato
